episode.title: An Extra Kick in the Nuts
episode.rawTitle: 379: ‘An Extra Kick in the Nuts’, With Christian Selig
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Christian Selig, developer of the excellent apps Apollo and Pixel Pals, joins the show to talk about Reddit's Twitter-fication, along with highlights from WWDC 2023.
episode.showNotes:
Christian Selig, developer of the excellent apps Apollo and Pixel Pals, joins the show to talk about Reddit's Twitter-fication, along with highlights from WWDC 2023.
